validation_rules: qc_prg5_wetland_validation(co_ter, cl_drain, gr_ess, cl_dens, cl_haut, type_eco)
description: Translate only when one of wc, vt OR im is not NULL
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

translation_rules: qc_prg5_wetland_translation(co_ter, cl_drain, gr_ess, cl_dens, cl_haut, type_eco, 1)
description: No validation required because the row_translation_rule has already validated that a wetland code exists. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the first character.
